description: Local-only image generator that turns modular style controls into bespoke outputs without touching the cloud.

paragraphs: On-device diffusion models respect GPU budgets by pruning attention heads and caching noise schedules per style pack.
The control panel wires palette, composition, and seed logic into a reproducible manifest so artists can rerun any look with a single config file.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: CACHED LATENTS CUT ITERATION TIME MORE THAN ANY UI TWEAK.
